segments.text: Have you heard that Tom and his wife divorced ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't hear that . But I can deduce the reason .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tom is a kind guy , but addicted to gambling . He spends all his time gambling in the casino . And his wife can't put up with his incessant gambling any longer , so she divorced him . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , quite right . Gambling broke up a happy family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! Gambling is often a curse . By gambling we lose time and treasure , two things most precious to a man .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Besides that , many people took to gambling and got in over their heads , and gradually ruined themselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In a word , gambling is a vice . We should be away from it .
segments.speaker: S2
